00057 <?php
00058 if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID'])) {
00059     $itemID = (integer)$_POST['itemID'];
00060     $rec_q = $dbs->query("SELECT
00061         stock_take_name AS '".__('Stock Take Name')."',
00062         start_date AS '".__('Start Date')."',
00063         end_date AS '".__('End Date')."',
00064         init_user AS '".__('Initializer')."',
00065         total_item_stock_taked AS '".__('Total Item Stock Taked')."',
00066         total_item_lost AS '".__('Total Item Lost')."',
00067         total_item_exists AS '".__('Total Item Exists')."',
00068         total_item_loan AS '".__('Total Item On Loan')."',
00069         stock_take_users AS '".__('Stock Take Participants')."',
00070         is_active AS '".__('Status')."',
00071         report_file AS '".__('Report')."'
00072         FROM stock_take WHERE stock_take_id=".$itemID);
00073     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00074     // create table object
00075     $table = new simbio_table();
00076     $table->table_attr = 'align="center" class="border" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00077     // table header
00078     $table->setHeader(array($rec_d[__('Stock Take Name')]));
00079     $table->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" colspan="3"';
00080     // initial row count
00081     $row = 1;
00082     foreach ($rec_d as $headings => $stk_data) {
00083         if ($headings == 'stock_take_id') {
00084             continue;
00085         } else if ($headings == __('Status')) {
00086             if ($stk_data == '1') {
00087                 $stk_data = '<b style="color: #FF0000;">'.__('Currently Active').'</b>';
00088             } else {
00089                 $stk_data = 'Finished';
00090             }
00091         }
00092         $table->appendTableRow(array($headings, ':', $stk_data));
00093         // set cell attribute
00094         $table->setCellAttr($row, 0, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 170px;"');
00095         $table->setCellAttr($row, 1, 'class="alterCell" valign="top" style="width: 1%;"');
00096         $table->setCellAttr($row, 2, 'class="alterCell2" valign="top" style="width: auto;"');
00097         // add row count
00098         $row++;
00099     }
00100     // print out table
00101     echo $table->printTable();
00102 } else {
00103     /* STOCK TAKE HISTORY LIST */
00104     // table spec
00105     $table_spec = 'stock_take AS st';
00106 
00107     // create datagrid
00108     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00109     $datagrid->setSQLColumn('st.stock_take_id',
00110         'st.stock_take_name AS \''.__('Stock Take Name').'\'',
00111         'st.start_date AS \''.__('Start Date').'\'',
00112         'st.end_date AS \''.__('End Date').'\'',
00113         'CONCAT(\'<a href="'.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.FILES_DIR.'/'.REPORT_DIR.'/\', st.report_file, \'" target="_blank">\', st.report_file, \'</a>\') AS \''.__('Report').'\'');
00114     $datagrid->setSQLorder('st.start_date DESC');
00115     $datagrid->disableSort('Report');
00116 
00117     // is there any search
00118     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00119         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00120         $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00121         if (count($words) > 1) {
00122             $concat_sql = ' (';
00123             foreach ($words as $word) {
00124                 $concat_sql .= " (stock_take_name LIKE '%$word%' OR init_user LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00125             }
00126             // remove the last AND
00127             $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00128             $concat_sql .= ') ';
00129             $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($concat_sql);
00130         } else {
00131             $datagrid->setSQLCriteria("stock_take_name LIKE '%$keyword%' OR init_user LIKE '%$keyword%'");
00132         }
00133     }
00134 
00135     // set table and table header attributes
00136     $datagrid->icon_edit = $sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00137     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00138     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00139     $datagrid->chbox_property = false;
00140     // set delete proccess URL
00141     $datagrid->delete_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00142 
00143     // put the result into variables
00144     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, true);
00145     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00146         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00147         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00148     }
00149 
00150     echo $datagrid_result;
00151 }
00152 ?>
